__e: Your son and your army are with you
As your king, I have decided... that it's time for our army to march!
I think we are a body strong enough, even as we are, to equal with the king.
He said... the day he crawled out from the pile of corpses... he was a dead man.
Sir, the Book says, "There is no king that can be saved by the multitude of a host..."
If I screamed... who would listen to me in the army of the angels?
We have a great army and we should use it.
Take your army and bring me that girl and her dog.
I had no choice but to take my soldiers and the child become a fugitive
Richard will return home through the Forest of Broceliande.
The English force, so please you.
I would need a wall of women to be protected from you.
